extendedInfo.description: The New Dimension Shooting RPG! Zombie Metro â SeoulForget all shooting games till now! Forget all the RPG games that youâve ever played! The new trend is in Shooting RPG!Be the Hero as Dennis or Yoa to take on and clear out the Zombies with full action packed storylines!This is a single game.* Notice : Some of players told that there are some bugs..such as character level system.. broadcon dev teamhas tried to fix some bugs.. If any bug during the play, please send your bug report to Broadcon Team or write in the board. Thank you!! *The year 2020, Seoul will be teeming with Zombies and it is up to you, the Hero, to vanquish them.1.	Virtual keypad to interact in 3rd Person Action!     Navigate through the ruined city of Seoul,      take on the Zombie hordes in the Metro stations and      strengthen you character as you fight through Seoul.2.	High Quality 2D HD Graphics!      Latest graphics model to render elegant and stunning 2D HD graphics.3.	Dynamic Battles!     Choose over 30 different weapons, armor and      12 sets of defense towers to fully wage war against the enemy.      Dennis and Yoa have separate special skills to add to the fun!4.	Wide range of items!     Equip different items for different stats of your own choosing,      pickup normal, rare or unique items to help your character grow.5.	Wide range of Zombie bosses!     There are many Zombie bosses barring your way.      Fight through them and defeat them for your special items and rewards!Zombie Metro â Seoul is a FREE game you can download and play right away. For a more exhilarating and dynamic game play, try buying our extra items!Any errors concerning bugs or other errors please inquire to our Email address, Homepage or Twitter accounts.* BroadCON team loves Zombie Culture!!! We Love World War Z & Warm Bodies!!! * Update History *v1.0.4.0(2013-04-25)- Made Controller Easier v1.0.3.0(2013-03-15)- Log in Bug Fixed- Resistant Play Bugs Fixedv1.0.2.0(2013-02-18)- Resistant Play Bugs Fixed(Guild member list)v1.0.1.8(2013-02-07)- Server related Bugs Fixedv1.0.1.7(2013-02-07)- Resistant Play Bugs Fixed- Images Changed v1.0.1.6(2013-02-04)- Resistant Play Bugs Fixed- Minor Bugs Fixed - Heyzap Integrated(Achievements)v1.0.1(2013-01-25)- Minor Bugs Fixed-Email: appstore@broadcon.co.kr-Homepage: www.broadcon.net-Twitter: @broadcon-Facebook: www.facebook.com/broadconhc

reviews.title: yo
reviews.comment: holy smoke super fun but I don\'t want this game is a single game
reviews.author: lyheng chhun

reviews.title: Not bad but nit brill either so far
reviews.comment: I like the look if this gane but the fire button needs to be completely active for firing and not one little section of it that you cant see because you finger is on it. Fix that and it eould stop the moans about the controls. Im not deleting just yet as going tk give it a littke more of a chance first
reviews.author: neal barker

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Started downloading the game mid way said \"error not enough memory\" when i cleary do on phone and sd card please fix really want to play.
reviews.author: David Rodriguez

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: There are a few glitches, but the gameplay is nice to see studios listening to us in forums. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Abeward Pena

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: Did you even test this game before you released it? The controls are unresponsive, the grammar is horrid, the game lags like there\'s no tomorrow, and it keeps booting me out of missions.
reviews.author: alec vidamo

reviews.title: Would be five...
reviews.comment: The prep screen for missions tends to white out and subsequently the stage as well. The controls are clunky and unresponsive. For example I needed health and I died before the game would register my tap. It could be a fantastic game otherwise!
reviews.author: Aaron Parks

reviews.comment: Wouldn\'t load, Forced closed. Failure. Uninstalled. Let me know when its fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible controls
reviews.comment: Not sure what\'s up with the firing control, looks way more complex than it needs to be and doesn\'t fire most of the time. Cannot fire any direction but where character faces when you manage to get a shot off.
reviews.author: Jared Stapleton

reviews.title: Dont now..
reviews.comment: I just install this app first.. I will try playing after downloading...is finish.. I hope ok...no more problme..
reviews.author: Pess Pipi

reviews.title: Great game if only...
reviews.comment: They just have to fix one thing. The controls. You shouldn\'t be able to turn with both the left and right thumb pads. You start shooting then turn the opposite direction then back. I\'m fighting with those more than the zombies
reviews.author: Allan Dill

reviews.title: Meh.
reviews.comment: The game is somewhat laggy and gets repetitive very quickly. The translation is pretty bad as well.
reviews.author: Noah C.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Needs rethinking and tweaking on camera angle and controls. Most other aspects of the game are exquisite.
